meanings.definition: To expel gas noisily from the stomach through the mouth.
meanings.sent1: After drinking soda too quickly, he burped loudly in class.
meanings.sent2: She burped after finishing her fizzy drink.
meanings.sent3: The baby burped during the quiet moment of the movie, causing giggles.
meanings.sent4: The old car engine burped and sputtered before finally starting.
meanings.sent5: The volcano burped out a cloud of ash and smoke, startling the nearby villagers.
